properties.value:
Declaration and Consent

Please read the following declaration carefully before proceeding with your registration.

Declaration:

I hereby declare that:

  1. All information provided in this registration form is true, accurate, and complete to the best of my knowledge.
  2. I am a resident of Lesotho and engaged in agricultural activities.
  3. I understand that providing false information may result in disqualification from agricultural subsidy programs.
  4. I authorize the Ministry of Agriculture and Food Security to verify the information provided.
  5. I understand that my information will be used for agricultural subsidy management and related government programs.
  6. I agree to update my information whenever there are significant changes to my farming activities or personal circumstances.
Data Protection and Privacy:

Your personal information will be:

  • Protected in accordance with Lesotho's data protection laws
  • Used only for agricultural subsidy management and related government services
  • Shared only with authorized government agencies and partners
  • Kept confidential and secure

properties.message: You must agree to all terms to proceed with registration

options.label: I have read and understood the declaration above
I agree to the terms and conditions of the agricultural subsidy programs
I consent to the verification of my information
I consent to the use of my data for agricultural program management
